definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: Bul, 8th month = Marcheswan, As. Araḫ samna, 1Ki 6:38 [[בְּיֶרַח בּוּל הוּא]] [[הַחׂדֶשׁ הַשְּׁמִינִי]]; (Canaanitish; Ph. [[ירח בל]]; a Palm. god is [[בול]] (in n.pr. [[עבדבול]], Vog:93 [[זבדבול]] etc.) & [[ירחבול]] (Vog:93, moon-god), which DHM:Ber. Wien. Ak. cviii. 977 connects with Heb. [[בּוּל]]; Bae:Rel 87 f. (q.v.) thinks = [[בעל]], cf. Thes:p. 560).
